\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:client.client_communicator_to_unity.__init__}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{\_\_init\_\_}}}{\emph{use\_unity\_build=True}, \emph{log\_level=20}}{}
Creates a socket and a logger for the console and saves a log file at: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{log/python\_client.log}}.
Starts Unity if \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{use\_unity\_build == True}} and waits until Unity is fully started to then call the function \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{connect\_to\_server()}}.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{use\_unity\_build}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- 
defaults to \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{True}},

If this is set true the Unity build will start. Otherwise you should already set the Unity editor to play.,


\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{log\_level}} (\sphinxtitleref{int}, optional) -- 
defaults to \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{logging.INFO}},

This variable sets the logging level of the console handler for the class which means how much information is displayed to your console.
For debugging set it to: logging.DEBUG


\end{itemize}

\item[{Raises}] \leavevmode
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{IOError}} -- Raises IOError if Unity build can not be found.

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{connect\_to\_server() (client.client\_communicator\_to\_unity method)@\spxentry{connect\_to\_server()}\spxextra{client.client\_communicator\_to\_unity method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:client.client_communicator_to_unity.connect_to_server}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{connect\_to\_server}}}{}{}
Establish tcp socket connection to Unity server.

Load client tcp config from \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{data/python/client\_tcp\_config.json}}.

Try to connect to the Unity server.

If connection is established save the tcp config to \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{data/python/client\_tcp\_config.json}}.

\end{fulllineitems}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:client.client_communicator_to_unity.exit}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{exit}}}{}{}
Close tcp connection and send end request to Unity which quits the build application.

\end{fulllineitems}

Returns string according to input parameter which can be interpreted by the Unity server. Should be used in function {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:client.client_communicator_to_unity.receive_image}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{receive\_image()}}}}} to create an image.

Has to be bigger than zero, defaults to 3

\item {}

\item {}

It is either a float if \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{same\_scale == True}}  or a list of floats with the lenght of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{total\_cuboids}}, defaults to 2.0

If it is zero the cuboids will be vertically allinged. If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{same\_theta == True}} it has to be a float, else it has to be list of float with the length of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{total\_cuboids - 1}}, defaults to 40.0

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{phi}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- The rotation in degrees around the origin on the vertical axis for all cuboids i.e. the whole crane, defaults to 0.0

\item {}

If it is not \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{None}} it has to be a \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{list}} of integers with the length of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{total\_cubiods-1}}.
The integers define how many branches are created at the cubiod corresponding to the index of the element in the list, defaults to None

Has to be a list of floats with the length of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{totalPointLights}}, defaults to {[}20.0{]}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{PointLightsPhi}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- The positions of all Pointlights in spherical coordinates. Has to be a list of floats with the length of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{totalPointLights}}, defaults to {[}0.0{]}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{PointLightsIntensity}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- The intensities of all Pointlights should be in the range of zero and one. Has to be a list of floats with the length of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{totalPointLights}}, defaults to {[}1.0{]}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{PointLightsRange}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- The range of the emitted light from the Pointlights. Should be adjusted depending on the position of the lights to "reach" the cuboids. Has to be a list of floats with the length of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{totalPointLights}}, defaults to {[}10.0{]}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{totalSpotLights}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- The total amount of Spotlights in the scene. \sphinxstyleemphasis{For more details about Spotlights have a look at the unity documentation}, defaults to 1

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{same\_SpotLightsColor}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- If all Spotlights should have the same color, defaults to True

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{SpotLightsColor\_r}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- The \sphinxstylestrong{red color} property of the light should be in the range of zero and one. If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{same\_SpotLightsColor == True}} it has to be a float, else it has to be a list of floats with the length of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{totalSpotLights}}, defaults to 1.0

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{SpotLightsColor\_g}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- The \sphinxstylestrong{green color} property of the light should be in the range of zero and one. If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{same\_SpotLightsColor == True}} it has to be a float, else it has to be a list of floats with the length of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{totalSpotLights}}, defaults to 1.0

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{SpotLightsColor\_b}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- The \sphinxstylestrong{blue color} property of the light should be in the range of zero and one. If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{same\_SpotLightsColor == True}} it has to be a float, else it has to be a list of floats with the length of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{totalSpotLights}}, defaults to 1.0

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{SpotLightsColor\_a}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- The \sphinxstylestrong{alpha channel/ transparency} of the color of the light should be in the range of zero and one. If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{same\_SpotLightsColor == True}} it has to be a float, else it has to be a list of floats with the length of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{totalSpotLights}}, defaults to 1.0

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{SpotLightsRadius}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- The positions of all Spotlights in spherical coordinates. Spotlights always face the origin. Has to be a list of floats with the length of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{totalSpotLights}}, defaults to {[}10.0{]}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{SpotLightsTheta}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- The positions of all Spotlights in spherical coordinates. Spotlights always face the origin. Has to be a list of floats with the length of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{totalSpotLights}}, defaults to {[}0.0{]}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{SpotLightsPhi}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- The positions of all Spotlights in spherical coordinates. Spotlights always face the origin. Has to be a list of floats with the length of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{totalSpotLights}}, defaults to {[}0.0{]}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{SpotLightsIntensity}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- The intensities of all Spotlights should be in the range of zero and one. Has to be a list of floats with the length of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{totalSpotLights}}, defaults to {[}1.0{]}, defaults to {[}1.0{]}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{SpotLightsRange}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- The range of the emitted light from the Spotlights. Should be adjusted depending on the position of the lights to "reach" the cuboids. Has to be a list of floats with the length of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{totalSpotLights}}, defaults to {[}10.0{]}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{SpotAngle}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- In degree this describes the angle created by the cone of the Spotlight. Has to be a list of floats with the length of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{totalSpotLights}}, defaults to {[}30.0{]}

\end{itemize}

\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
Returns a string with all given parameters for unity to interpret. Can be used in function {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:client.client_communicator_to_unity.receive_image}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{receive\_image()}}}}} to create an image.

\item[{Return type}] \leavevmode
string

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\begin{fulllineitems}

Get a list of the input parameters with a changed crane articulation at the cuboid \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{theta\_pos}} between \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{start\_value}} and \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{end\_value}}.
If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{theta\_pos}} is default then all theta of the crane are changing.

\item {}

\item {}

\item {}

Has to be smaller than \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{parameters{[}"total\_cuboids"{]}}} if not, set to \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{parameters{[}"total\_cuboids"{]}-1}}. If it is default: \sphinxtitleref{None} all thetas are changing, defaults to None

\end{itemize}

\item[{Return type}] \leavevmode
\sphinxtitleref{list}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\begin{fulllineitems}

\index{set\_config() (dataset.dataset\_cuboids method)@\spxentry{set\_config()}\spxextra{dataset.dataset\_cuboids method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:dataset.dataset_cuboids.set_config}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{set\_config}}}{\emph{same\_scale=None, scale={[}0.5, 4{]}, total\_cuboids={[}2, 12{]}, phi={[}0, 360{]}, branches={[}1, 3{]}, same\_theta=None, theta=None, same\_material=None, r={[}0, 1{]}, g={[}0, 1{]}, b={[}0, 1{]}, a={[}0.5, 1{]}, metallic={[}0, 1{]}, smoothness={[}0, 1{]}, CameraRadius=10.0, CameraTheta={[}30, 100{]}, CameraPhi={[}0, 360{]}, CameraVerticalOffset=None, totalPointLights={[}5, 12{]}, PointLightsRadius={[}5, 20{]}, PointLightsPhi={[}0, 360{]}, PointLightsTheta={[}0, 90{]}, PointLightsIntensity={[}7, 17{]}, PointLightsRange={[}5, 25{]}, samePointLightColor=None, PointLightsColor\_r={[}0, 1{]}, PointLightsColor\_g={[}0, 1{]}, PointLightsColor\_b={[}0, 1{]}, PointLightsColor\_a={[}0.5, 1{]}, totalSpotLights=None, SpotLightsRadius={[}5, 20{]}, SpotLightsPhi={[}0, 360{]}, SpotLightsTheta={[}0, 90{]}, SpotLightsIntensity={[}5, 15{]}, SpotLightsRange={[}5, 25{]}, SpotLightsAngle={[}5, 120{]}, sameSpotLightColor=None, SpotLightsColor\_r={[}0, 1{]}, SpotLightsColor\_g={[}0, 1{]}, SpotLightsColor\_b={[}0, 1{]}, SpotLightsColor\_a={[}0.5, 1{]}, DirectionalLightTheta={[}0, 90{]}, DirectionalLightIntensity={[}0.1, 1.8{]}}}{}~\begin{description}
\item[{Sets a config for this class instace which determines the interval for all random parameters created in the function {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:dataset.dataset_cuboids.create_random_parameters}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{create\_random\_parameters()}}}}}. The meaning of all the parameters are explained in this function: {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:client.client_communicator_to_unity.write_json_crane}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{write\_json\_crane()}}}}}.}] \leavevmode
Here are only those parameters mentioned which deviate from the \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{standard\_parameter}}.

\end{description}
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{"standard\_parameter"}} -- Has to be a list with two floats. The first element describes the lower boundary and second element describes the upper boundary for the function {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:dataset.dataset_cuboids.create_random_parameters}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{create\_random\_parameters()}}}}} in which the variable is set randomly, defaults is a predefined list

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{same\_scale}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{None}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{None}} the boolean will be set randomly in {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:dataset.dataset_cuboids.create_random_parameters}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{create\_random\_parameters()}}}}}. Otherwise it will be set to the given boolean, defaults to None

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{branches}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{None}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{None}} there will be no branches which means one main branch. Else has to be a list with two integers. The amount of branches created in {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:dataset.dataset_cuboids.create_random_parameters}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{create\_random\_parameters()}}}}} at every cuboid will be chosen from a normal distribution where the second element of this list is interpreted als three sigma deviation, defaults to {[}1,3{]}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{same\_theta}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{None}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{None}} the boolean will be set randomly in {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:dataset.dataset_cuboids.create_random_parameters}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{create\_random\_parameters()}}}}}. Otherwise it will be set to the given boolean, defaults to None

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{theta}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{None}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{None}} the values for theta is set randomly between zero and \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{360/total\_cuboids}}. Otherwise it has to be a list of length 2, defaults to None

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{same\_material}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{None}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{None}} the boolean will be set randomly in {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:dataset.dataset_cuboids.create_random_parameters}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{create\_random\_parameters()}}}}}. Otherwise it will be set to the given boolean, defaults to None

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{CameraRadius}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{float}} then the value in {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:dataset.dataset_cuboids.create_random_parameters}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{create\_random\_parameters()}}}}} will not be random, instead set to the given \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{float}}. If it is a list it has to be a list of length two, defaults to 10.0

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{CameraTheta}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{float}} then the value in {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:dataset.dataset_cuboids.create_random_parameters}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{create\_random\_parameters()}}}}} will not be random, instead set to the given \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{float}}. If it is a list it has to be a list of length two, defaults to {[}30,100{]}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{CameraPhi}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{float}} then the value in {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:dataset.dataset_cuboids.create_random_parameters}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{create\_random\_parameters()}}}}} will not be random, instead set to the given \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{float}}. If it is a list it has to be a list of length two, defaults to {[}0,360{]}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{CameraVerticalOffset}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{None}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{None}} it is set to zero. If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{float}} then the value in {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:dataset.dataset_cuboids.create_random_parameters}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{create\_random\_parameters()}}}}} will not be random, instead set to the given \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{float}}. If it is a list it has to be a list of length two, defaults to None

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{totalPointLights}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{None}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{None}} there will be no Pointlights created in {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:dataset.dataset_cuboids.create_random_parameters}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{create\_random\_parameters()}}}}}. Else it has to be a list of integers with the length two, defaults to {[}5,12{]}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{samePointLightColor}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{None}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{None}} the boolean will be chosen randomly, else the given boolean is used, defaults to None

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{totalSpotLights}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{None}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{None}} there will be no Spotlights created in {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:dataset.dataset_cuboids.create_random_parameters}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{create\_random\_parameters()}}}}}. Else it has to be a list of integers with the length two, defaults to None

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{sameSpotLightColor}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{None}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) -- If \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{None}} the boolean will be chosen randomly, else the given boolean is used, defaults to None

\item {}
